name: Impure
overview: Rio de Janeiro, during the 90's. Evandro dreams about becoming a great businessman, but ends up entering the world of crime and making an empire out of his criminal organization. His business skills and leadership abilities draw the attention of Morello, a federal police officer with a self-destructive behavior who sees in Evandro a worthy enemy. Two strategists that share the love for danger. The hunt down begins.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Evandro faces a tense standoff; new enemies emerge in the wake of the Urquizas death.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: At risk and wanted by the police, Evandro is forced to deal with a new enemy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Evandro settles a matter in Dendê; Morello’s effort’s to control Inês backfires.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Evandro sets his sights on the United States; Morello reverts into his fatherly role.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Morello launches a new investigation; Evandro returns to Brazil in need of cash.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Arlete speaks out against her son on national television; Geise considers drastic measures.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As his business expands, Evandro is forced to choose between a friend and his family.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Evandro considers a drastic measure that will have lasting consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Morello’s meddling in Evandro’s personal affairs leads the two down the path to war.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Afonso and Inês prepare to settle scores with Wilbert; Morello lays a trap for Evandro.

episodes.name: Monsters on the Prowl
episodes.overview: Evandro’s enemies, both old and new, plot against him. Inês and Afonso become fugitives.

episodes.name: Bonnie & Clyde
episodes.overview: Evandro takes measures to protect his drug money. Afonso and Inês are given an infamous label.

episodes.name: Like father Like Son
episodes.overview: Chernobyl initiates a power struggle. Geise negotiates to increase drug shipments out of Bolivia.

episodes.name: Cross-fire
episodes.overview: Evandro aims to use an assassination attempt to his advantage. Flávio catches up to Afonso and Inês.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Morello pins his hopes of capturing Evandro on Helena. Arlete turns to the bottle after a tragedy.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Navarro maneuvers to cut Evandro out of the White Gold market. Afonso and Inês embrace their infamy.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Evandro negotiates with the CCP. Geise discovers the mastermind responsible for Maria’s death.

episodes.name: Eye for an eye
episodes.overview: Ademar betrays Evandro. Geise moves to avenge Maria’s death. Afonso seeks Morello's help in Uruguay.

episodes.name: The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot
episodes.overview: Navarro pays for Maria’s death. Evandro is forced to choose between his family and his favela.

episodes.name: Inês Is Gone
episodes.overview: Evandro prepares to go to war with Ademar. Morello aims to take down his adversary once and for all.
